name: Mal (Rai_Vineet)
description:
A Mal is basically a 2-D Side Scroller Horror Game with 3rd person view. A Player have to overcome the distinct puzzles and hurdles in the game to finish the level. While Playing the game, player will also experience the real terror and horror. 

Story-Line:

A girl named Mal found herself in the unknown environment and managing to escape while revealing the mystery of the place.
